name: palmately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A palmately shaped leaf is formed from several leaves that are joined at a central point like the fingers of an open hand: palmately lobed The large, palmately lobed leaves may be over 20 inches across. Related word
palmate
More examplesFewer examplesMany species have leaves divided into five leaflets arranged palmately like the fingers of a hand.The leaves are palmately divided with up to 15 narrow leaflets.Its palmately lobed leaves are rough in texture and can grow as wide as eight inches.It has 3- to 5-inch narrow leaves that are simple near the top of the plant and palmately compound lower down.
